You know,

There IS a way to avoid all this nonsense between uploaders (or should I say n00b uploaders), whingers and n00b uploader's defense attorneys.

IF ALL uploaders stuck to protocol and named their files correctly, the entire world would be a better place.  

Using the correct tags in the name will divert any potential whingers avoiding the need for the n00b uploader's defense attorneys to rebut or refut any complaints. This in turn phases out rubbish releases in favor to quality rips, ultimately resulting in a much much healthier Internet infrustructure.

All in ALL, if ALL uploaders properly named their torrents... EVERYONE will be better off.
